params._storageT: The address of the storage contract.

params._index: The index of the open limit order.
params._pairIndex: The index of the trading pair.
params._type: The type of the limit order.

params._bot: The address that triggered the limit order.

params._triggerTimeout: The new timeout value, must be greater than or equal to 5.

claimTokens().notice: Claims the pending token Reward for the caller.

setOpenLimitOrderType(address,uint256,ui.notice: Sets the type of a given open limit order.

storeFirstToTrigger((address,uint256,uin.notice: Stores the first address to trigger a limit order.

updateTriggerTimeout(uint256).notice: Updates the timeout for trigger functions.
